On the Thursday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will discuss Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton’s performance at the Commander-in-Chief Forum moderated Wednesday evening by NBC’s Matt Lauer.

Former UN Ambassador John Bolton and Dr. Sebastian Gorka, Breitbart National Security Editor and author of Defeating Jihad: The Winnable War, will provide their analysis of Trump and Clinton’s foreign policy answers.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Marlow will also be joined in-studio in New York by former Navy SEAL and CEO of Blackwater Erik Prince.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Veteran pollster Pat Caddell will update us on the state of the race for the White House.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
